title: ECOLEAD - PVC in HR Management for AIESEC AlumniAIESEC Demonstration Scenario/ WP4
segmentation: Represented here, Isaac International unfortunately was not able to join you earlier in this training session, so I apologize for that and I'm going to talk about the demonstration activity which relates to establishment of the professional virtual Community for human resource management for Aiesec alumni.

It's not about maintaining social links between alumni.

This is where they use these networks for their productive economic gains.
And one of the idea how to make it and demonstrate this methodology.
Back to looking within the time frame that we've got is to involve ISA corporate partners into this activities.
And also use this professionals to consult current students because they have challenges related to HRT issues.
And ultimately, cultivating business ideas in this community.
A couple of words.
Finish my presentation.
Is about specific challenges.
That we face with this demonstration scenario that we will be addressing in the current month.
Is that as I just explained, Isaac is a very diverse, decentralized, heterogeneous community of people, both current students and mainly alumni.
So the challenge is how to find all those channels to attract right people to the community, how to work with them while online across the generations o'clock across countries, geographies.
And also let's not forget human resource management is a diverse field, enormous tech engineering.
So many stuff, different issues that people have different preferences.
This is a challenge.
And very specific as well.
There is a business model challenge because Isaac, as a student organization, relies on sponsorship from large companies who are interested in tapping the pool of young leaders.

Therefore, if we create the professional virtual community for alumni in HR, who will be doing business, there is a clear conflict of interest between their mother entity which is Isaac and organ PVC, which is also doing business in the same area.
Which makes this demonstration even more exciting.
And.

There is always a danger that the demonstration may slip into the.

That is not exactly what we're demonstrating there.

So that's it.
